name: DescribeDataCategoryGroupStructureResult

methods.name: getDescription
methods.description: Returns the description of the data category group.

methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Returns the label for the data category group used in the Salesforce user interface.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the unique name used by the API to access to the data category group.

methods.name: getSobject
methods.description: Returns the name of object associated with the data category group.

methods.name: getTopCategories
methods.description: Returns a Schema.DataCategory object, that contains the top categories visible depending on the user's data category group visibility settings.

description: Contains the category groups and categories associated with KnowledgeArticleVersion and Question.
